title: Does anyone know a similar font to this one?
content:
I have been searching for DAYS for a font that is similar to the "Mama Kin" name on the website below:

[http://mamakinband.bandpage.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021094750/http:/mamakinband.bandpage.com/ "http://mamakinband.bandpage.com/")

Does anyone know anything? Anything that is aztec/tribal inspired???

Thank you so much, I really appreciate it.  
Nix
author: nixsheth23
